title: Studio Capitol Hill $1075 Special
posting_body: ['Franklin Roosevelt Apartments', '|', 'show contact info', '1180 Sherman St, Denver, CO    Perfect for someone working downtown.', ' Walking distance to 16th St.', 'Mall SHUTTLE.', '          Studio/1Bath Apartment  $1055/month      Bedrooms Studio   Bathrooms 1 full, 0 partial     Sq Footage 450     Parking  None    Pet Policy No pets   Deposit $900', "DESCRIPTION <>   The Franklin Roosevelt was built in the 1940's, in a nationally recognized historic district.", ' It combines the richness of the past with all of the conveniences of today.', 'see additional photos below                       RENTAL FEATURES<> - Refrigerator- Carpet- Stove/Oven-', 'Gated property- Cap Hill-', 'Secured entry-Capital Hill', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES <', '> - Laundry on-site-', 'Near transportation-', 'Vintage building', 'LEASE TERMS <> Six Month Lease, at the end of the term, it rolls into Month to Month.', '                  ADDITIONAL PHOTOS <>', 'Photo       Contact info:        Franklin Roosevelt Apartments', 'show contact info', 'Posted: July 31, 2022 8:41pm PST']
